name: ebook2audiobook
description: ebook2audiobook is a utility that converts eBooks into spoken audio using text-to-speech engines. It is aimed at users who prefer listening to long texts and automates the process from input files to audio output.

features.title: Text
features.description: Transform ebooks into spoken audio automatically. Listen instead of reading

features.title: Multiple Formats
features.description: Support for various ebook file types. Universal compatibility

features.title: Automated Processing
features.description: Batch convert entire libraries effortlessly. Save hours of manual work

features.title: Quality Audio
features.description: Natural-sounding voice synthesis. Pleasant listening experience

features.title: Accessibility
features.description: Make written content accessible to everyone. Inclusive reading solution

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Process your books privately. Complete control over conversions
